title: WBPSC Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 35 Economist, Inspector & Other Posts
text: 1. Economist-Cum-Credit Planner: 17 Posts 2. Quinologist: 01 Post 3. Assistant Quinologist: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be not more than 40 years for Post 1, between 30-40 years for Post 2 & not more than 36 years for Post 3 as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess second class Master’s degree in Economics with Statistics as one of the subjects from a recognized University/ Institute, 5 (five) years’ experience in the preparation and assessment of plans and projects or 5 (five) years’ teaching experience in Economics in a degree college for Post 1, M.Sc. degree in Chemistry or M.Pharm in Pharmaceutical Chemistry of an Indian University with a first class either in Master’s degree or in B.Sc. Honours degree or an equivalent degree of a British or other recognized foreign University, Experience in industrial concerns producing quinine or pharmaceutical drugs and Research experience for a period of at least two years for Post 2 & M.Sc degree in Chemistry [an Applied Chemist or Pharmaceutical Chemist or M.Pharm or B.Tech of an Indian University, preferably with a first class either in Master’s degree or in the B.Sc. Honours degree or an equivalent degree of a British or other recognized foreign University, Research experience for a period of at least one year for Post 3. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on preliminary screening test, interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.210/- +Service Charge 1% of Examination Fee subject to a minimum of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) for online payment through debit/credit card plus 12.36% of service charge as Govt. Duty or Service Charge of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) only for Net Banking or Service Charge of Rs.20/- (Rupees Twenty) only for payment through Bank Counter (off-line payment). No fee for S.C./ S.T candidates of West Bengal/ Persons with disabilities (PWD) having physical disability of 40%. No exemption of fee is available to SC/ ST candidates of other states. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.pscwb.org.in/ www.pscwbonline.gov.in from 11.30 AM on wards on 14-03-2017 to 03-04-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Candidates log on the website www.pscwb.org.in/ www.pscwbonline.gov.in 2. Select the desired post & click on One time registration 3. Read all instructions & fill all the details 4. Check once before submit the form 5. Now take a print out of online application for future use. Important Dates: Starting Date & Time for Online Application: 14-03-2017 from 11.30 AM on wards. Last Date for Submission of Application: 03-04-2017. Last Date of Payment of Fees through Online: 03-04-2017. Last Date of Payment of Fees through Offline: 04-04-2017. For more details like pay, qualification, experience, selection process & other information click on the link given below…. WBPSC Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 16 Name of the Post: 1. Inspector of Legal Meteorology: 14 Posts 2. Sub Editor for Urdu Language: 01 post 3. Junior Programmer: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not more than 36 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to 05 years for SC/ ST candidates & 03 years for OBC – A & OBC – B candidates of West Bengal State. For more relaxation details refer the notification. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Graduation of a recognized university in Science (With Physics as one of the subjects), Technology or Engineering or Diploma in Engineering and able to speak, read and write the regional language of the state, i.e., Bengali/ Nepali for the candidates whose mother tongue is Nepali for Post No. 01, Honours Degree from a recognized University for Post No. 02 & BCA or B.Sc in Computer Science with First Class or at least 60% of marks or its equivalent from a recognized University/ Institute or B.Sc with DOEACC ‘A’ level for Post No. 03 with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test, screening test & interview. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs.160/- +Service Charge 1% of Examination Fee subject to a minimum of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) for online payment through debit/ credit card plus 12.36% of service charge as Govt. Duty or Service Charge of Rs.5/- (Rupees Five) only for Net Banking or Service Charge of Rs.20/- (Rupees Twenty) only for payment through Bank Counter (off-line payment). No fee for S.C./ S.T candidates of West Bengal/ Persons with disabilities (PWD) having physical disability of 40%. No exemption of fee is available to SC/ ST candidates of other states. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.pscwb.org.in/ www.pscwbonline.gov.in from 21-03-2017 to 28-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Candidates log on the website www.pscwb.org.in/ www.pscwbonline.gov.in 2. Select the desired post & click on One time registration 3. Read all instructions & fill all the details 4. Check once before submit the form 5. Now take a print out of online application for future use.
